com.simbachain.simba

Class Simba<C extends SimbaConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simbachain.simba.SimbaClient
      • com.simbachain.simba.Simba<C>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContractService

    public abstract class Simba<C extends SimbaConfig>
extends SimbaClient
    Main entry point to interacting with Simba. The client has methods for invoking contract methods, checking transaction status and checking account balance and retrieving funds where applicable.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.simbachain.simba.SimbaClient

      • waitForTransactionCompletion

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<Transaction> waitForTransactionCompletion(java.lang.String txnId,
                                                                             long interval,
                                                                             int totalSeconds)
                                                                      throws SimbaException
        Wait for a transaction to reach COMPLETED stage.
        Parameters:
        txnId - The transaction or requiest ID.
        interval - Interval to poll the server.
        totalSeconds - Total time to wait.
        Returns:
        a Future object that returns a Transaction.
        Throws:
        SimbaException - if something goes wrong.

      • waitForTransactionCompletion

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<Transaction> waitForTransactionCompletion(java.lang.String txnId)
                                                                      throws SimbaException
        Wait for a transaction to reach COMPLETED stage. Polling interval is set to 1 second and total wait time is set to 10 seconds.
        Parameters:
        txnId - The transaction or requiest ID.
        Returns:
        a Future object that returns a Transaction.
        Throws:
        SimbaException - if something goes wrong.

      • waitForTransactionSubmitted

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<Transaction> waitForTransactionSubmitted(java.lang.String txnId,
                                                                            long interval,
                                                                            int totalSeconds)
                                                                     throws SimbaException
        Wait for a transaction to reach SUBMITTED stage.
        Parameters:
        txnId - The transaction or requiest ID.
        interval - Interval to poll the server.
        totalSeconds - Total time to wait.
        Returns:
        a Future object that returns a Transaction.
        Throws:
        SimbaException - if something goes wrong.

      • waitForTransactionSubmitted

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<Transaction> waitForTransactionSubmitted(java.lang.String txnId)
                                                                     throws SimbaException
        Wait for a transaction to reach SUBMITTED stage. Polling interval is set to 1 second and total wait time is set to 10 seconds.
        Parameters:
        txnId - The transaction or requiest ID.
        Returns:
        a Future object that returns a Transaction.
        Throws:
        SimbaException - if something goes wrong.
